faqs.question: What is Cats Blender Plugin?
faqs.answer:
# Cats Blender Plugin

[info]Cats Blender Plugin is a comprehensive tool for VRChat model optimization.[/info]

## Supported Model Formats:
• MMD
• XNALara
• Mixamo
• Source Engine
• Unreal Engine
• DAZ/Poser
• Blender Rigify
• Sims 2
• Motion Builder
• 3DS Max
• And potentially more!

[note]The plugin is designed to streamline the process of importing and optimizing models for VRChat use.[/note]

faqs.question: What is Avatar Toolkit?
faqs.answer:
# Avatar Toolkit

[info]Avatar Toolkit is the next generation of avatar optimization tools, planned for Blender 5.0+[/info]

## Key Features:
• Modern replacement for Cats Blender Plugin
• Integrated functionality of multiple add-ons
• Streamlined workflow for Unity and other engines

[note]Avatar Toolkit aims to reduce dependency on third-party add-ons by incorporating features from:
• Material Combiner
• MMD Tools
• And more![/note]
